properties.entry: SELECT R.*, U.USER_NAME, T.REPLY_TYPE, U.USER_IMG_RENAME FROM REPLY R JOIN USER_INFO U ON R.USER_NO = U.USER_NO JOIN REPLY_TYPE T ON R.REPLY_TYPE_NO = T.REPLY_TYPE_NO WHERE R.REPLY_TYPE_NO = ? AND R.REPLY_TARGET_NO = ? AND R.REPLY_ST = 'N' ORDER BY R.REPLY_DT DESC
INSERT INTO REPLY VALUES( SEQ_REPLY_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, ?, DEFAULT)
SELECT SEQ_REPLY_NO.CURRVAL AS REPLY_NO, SYSTIMESTAMP AS REPLY_DT FROM DUAL
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_ST = 'Y' WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
